name: tm78
effect: Teaches Captivate to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulldoze to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Captivate)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
